content.value:
Hostal C.Q. Candelaria is located en La Candelaria, Historic Centre of Bogota. Is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, old town exploring and history. Hostal CQ Candelaria in Bogotá is set 600 m from Luis Angel Arango Library. Less than 1 km from Quevedo's Place and a 13-minute walk from Bolivar Square.

We offer mixed dorm, female dorm and private rooms all with wiifi, hot water 24 hours.

Featuring a garden, terrace and rooms with free Wi-Fi, Hostal CQ Candelaria is located in Bogotá, a 1-minute walk from Quevedo Jet. The property is a 3-minute walk from the Luis Ángel Arango Library. Plaza Bolívar is 600 meters from the property.

description.description: In Hostal C.Q. Candelaria our staff is waiting to assist you, we have free tours, wiifi, hot water, 24 hour reception, and all the information you need to know the real Bogota. Come and enjoy the beautiful Bogota while playing darts, frog (a traditional Colombian game), ping pong, share a barbecue or you take a guaro for the cold. We are located in the centre of the city, two blocks from the largest library in Colombia Luis Angel Arango, one block from the Plaza del Chorro de Quevedo and 10 minutes walk from the Plaza de Bolívar.
